outcomeMeasures.title: Exhaled Levels of Nitric Oxide
outcomeMeasures.description: Nitric Oxide was measured applying a real time technique for measurement of Nitric Oxide in Exhaled Breath Condensate. Elevated Nitric Oxide in exhalate is a measure of elevated production of NO in conditions such as underlying inflammation and/or oxidative stress. Exhaled NO was reported as the mean of three values within 10% of each other.

outcomeMeasures.title: Specific Airway Conductance (sGaw) as Measured by Plethysmography
outcomeMeasures.description: Specific airway conductance (sGaw) is the airway conductance relative to lung volume because it takes into account the important effect of lung volume on airway resistance, it is a useful index of bronchomotor tone.
